hero.trustedPartner: Your Trusted Partner on the Journey to Recovery
hero.title: The Path to <1>Freedom</1> Begins with a Step.
hero.description: With you step-by-step towards full recovery. A safe environment, a professional team, and unlimited support to start a new life full of inner peace.

leadership.title: Inspiring Leadership & Global Expertise
leadership.description: Our therapeutic journey is led by a name synonymous with trust and experience, <1>Dr. Ihab El-Kharrat</1>, supported by an elite team of doctors and specialists with the highest international qualifications.
leadership.card1Desc: Doctors, psychologists, and recovery coaches work as one team to support you throughout your journey.
leadership.card2Desc: Prestigious international experience and accreditations ensure you receive professional and safe medical care.
leadership.card3Desc: Accredited by the General Secretariat of Mental Health of the Egyptian Ministry of Health.

services.title: Specialized Treatment Programs for Every Challenge
services.description: Whatever the addiction, we have the optimal treatment path to help you.
card1Points: Treatment for heroin and opioid addiction.
Treatment for stimulants like crystal meth.
Programs for safe withdrawal from cannabis and alcohol.
Managing addiction to medications and tranquilizers.
card2Points: Treatment for internet and social media addiction.
Programs for treating sex and pornography addiction.
services.genericDesc: A comprehensive program tailored to your needs.

methodology.title: Your Journey to <1>Freedom</1> Begins with Confident Steps
methodology.description: We understand that every experience is unique, so we accompany you step-by-step with a personalized treatment plan in a safe and professional environment.
methodology.step1Desc: A first confidential call to accurately understand your needs.
methodology.step2Desc: We create an integrated treatment plan that suits your condition and aspirations.
methodology.step3Desc: You join a safe and supportive environment that helps you change and recover.
methodology.step4Desc: We remain by your side even after the program ends to solidify your recovery.
methodology.visualCardDesc: We believe recovery begins not with fear, but with trust. Let us guide you calmly to a more balanced and free life.

facilities.title: A Healing Environment that Embraces Recovery
facilities.description: Because we know the treatment environment is integral to its success, we designed Al-Hurriya Foundation to be an oasis of tranquility and healing. Explore our facilities.
